thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Thursday, 08 Feb 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Tahoe Group To Acquire Stake In Real Estate Firm, To Issue Asset-Backed Securities

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Tahoe Group To Acquire Stake In Real Estate Firm, To Issue Asset-Backed Securities

organizations.name: brief-tahoe group to acquire stake in real estate firm

text:
Feb 7 (Reuters) - Tahoe Group Co Ltd:
* SAYS UNIT SIGNS AGREEMENT TO ACQUIRE 70 PERCENT STAKE IN REAL ESTATE FIRM FOR 785.5 MILLION YUAN ($125.49 million)
* SAYS IT PLANS TO ISSUE ASSET-BACKED SECURITIES OF UP TO 1.7 BILLION YUAN Source text in Chinese: bit.ly/2BcMWlc ; bit.ly/2Bf0Inq Further company coverage: ($1 = 6.2595 Chinese yuan renminbi) (Reporting by Hong Kong newsroom)
